attributes.comment:
I feel very dissapointed by your proposal. I saved for 2 years to be able to pay for
my citizenship because it is very hard to save 400 dollars in a low income family.
You need to consider that people asking for adjustmen is not rich and high
edudated people, our salaries can't compete with weel educated proffessionals,
and we go and work very hard everyday, mostly in occupations that are bad paid.
Not becouse we liked them but becouse we dont hae other choice, so we
sacrifize and keep studing. One of the most wonderful benefits to be a citizen is
the possibility of going to th university and get loans. now you want to make our
possibilities eveb harder to reach.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Zulema D. Rosales
